summary: This is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, discussing that Jeffrey Epstein has filed a notice of appeal regarding his bail determination. It highlights ongoing legal proceedings shortly after his arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; it is noted he has filed a notice of appeal of the bail determination.

events.title: Epstein files notice of appeal on bail
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein files a notice of appeal regarding the court's bail determination in his criminal case.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY (United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York dated July 23, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein filed a notice of appeal regarding the bail determination in his criminal case.
The correspondence indicates active legal maneuvering by Epstein's defense team shortly after his arrest.
The email chain involves multiple prosecutors from the Public Corruption Unit, though their names are redacted.
The document confirms the location of the U.S. Attorney's Office as 1 St. Andrew's Plaza in New York.
